resources.string: Please provide your genuine name to ensure effective communication and for better assistance. We kindly ask you to refrain from using offensive or inappropriate names, as doing so may result in the suspension or termination of your account. Your cooperation is greatly appreciated.
Welcome to SparkChat! Prepare for a mesmerizing mix of simplicity and speed, but first, agree to our terms and conditions!
By clicking the "Accept" button, you agree to abide by these terms and privacy policy. Please read the full Terms of Service and Privacy Policy below for more details or contact us

SparkChat is the simplest, fastest, and easiest way to chat with your friends. Send text messages, create and join groups, all with just a few taps.\nShare SparkChat with your friends and let them experience the simplicity, speed, and ease of use for themselves.
Please enter a valid phone number, we can not send a carrier pigeon to deliver your verification code.
Invalid OTP! Please make sure you have entered the correct code. If you continue to enter invalid OTPs, your device may be temporarily banned from logging in for security reasons."
Uh-oh! The sign-in genie seems to be taking a nap. Wake them up with another attempt, and hopefully, they\'ll grant you access to the chat kingdom. Don\'t give up!
"Whoa there, cowboy! You've exceeded your daily limit of verification attempts. Take a break and come back later!"
"Verification failed. Maybe you should try again? Or check your internet connection? Just a thought..."
Please check your internet connection and try again.
Your login session has expired. Please log in again.
We need to verify this number (%1$s) kindly enter verification code that has been sent to your respected number.
